title: Real-time Surge Protection
description: React instantly to booking surges with real-time surge protection. Prevent underpricing, adjust rates dynamically, and maximize revenue with RoomPriceGenie.
content: ## Real-timesurge protectionthat helps you earn more from sudden increases in demand One of the saddest ways a hotel loses money is when a big event gets announced, and before you know what is happening, you sell your rooms at a fraction of the price you could have charged. At RoomPriceGenie, we are determined that this should never happen again to hotels. So, we created a protection model that triggers immediately after asurgeof bookings and gives you time to react to the situation. Never again will you sell your rooms too cheap. ## How real-timesurge protectionhelps hotels & rentals The famous Taylor Swift World Tour brought this issue to everyone’s attention but hoteliers near event venues have faced this challenge for years. Traditional systems react too slowly. With RoomPriceGenie’s real-time surge protection, you’re covered the moment demand jumps. No delays, no missed revenue opportunities. RoomPriceGenie’s real-timesurgeprotection reacts quicker than any human ever could, ensuring your room rates stay competitive and profitable. By adjusting your pricing the moment a surge is detected, you can avoid selling your rooms too cheap and remain in control of your pricing. ## How does theSurge Protectionfeature work? The Surge Protection feature monitors your property’s reservation data to identify when there is a significant increase in bookings for any given day, immediately adjusting the price and alerting you about the increased demand in your destination. The Surge Protection functionality triggers RoomPriceGenie to send you an e-mail alerting you of the surge in demand, with a link that will take you directly to the surge alert in the RoomPriceGenie system, where you can adjust your pricing accordingly. Notifications allow you to change your pricing accordingly to boost revenue, and with real-time automation adjusting your prices, you avoid leaving money on the table. ## Real-timeSurge Protectionfor Every Kind of Property RoomPriceGenie’s Surge Protection isn’t just for hotels, it’s built to support a variety of property types with flexible, intelligent price adjustments that work in real time. ## Hotel Stay ahead of demand spikes with automatic rate adjustments for big events and last-minute bookings, all tailored to the dynamics ofhotel revenue management. ## HotelGroups Forindependent hotel groups, surge protection works across multiple properties, keeping your pricing consistent and competitive. ## B&B Smaller properties like B&Bs can now accessrevenue management software for small hotels, helping them to act quickly when bookings spike. ## Apartments For vacation rentals and serviced apartments,vacation rental revenue managementjust got smarter with fast pricing adjustments. ## Powerful Tools That Work AlongsideSurge Protection RoomPriceGenie’s Surge Protection is just one part of a complete revenue management toolkit. These additional features help maximize your earnings and automate your pricing strategy: ## Reporting & Analytics dashboard Know what’s working with clear, actionable insights from ourrevenue analyticsdashboard. ## Minimum Stay TheminLOSfeature allows you to control length of stay requirements for high-demand periods, improving occupancy and revenue. ## Autopilot Let ourhotel dynamic pricing softwaredo the heavy lifting, autopilot keeps your prices optimal around the clock. ## Real-time optimization Let RoomPriceGenie optimize yourroom pricingwhile you focus on guests. ## Rate calendar Visualize and control your pricing strategy with thehotel rate calendar. ## Benefitsof Surge Protection With the RoomPriceGenie Surge Protection feature your room rates will always be priced accurately to secure you the most bookings with the highest ADR possible. You can customize it to your needs: - select who receives the e-mail notification (or whether to turn off the e-mail alerts completely), - how many bookings within a 24-hour period would trigger asurge, - and how far in advance the system should look for surge opportunities. ##
